name: Arrow Friday [DEMO] | v1.1 (Update)
description:
================= | Description | ==================

Arrow Friday is a fnf mod that takes the place of a boy named Jermaine. There is a rapping tournament called Flying Notes Tournament [FNT]. His goal is to get the winning prize from the tournament! Will he succeed in his goal [Maybe not because this is just a demo]? How about you play as Jermaine and get that prize!

================== | Controls | ===================

Menu: Left or right arrows to navigate the menu

Setting and Freeplay: Up or down arrows to navigate the setting

Esc: Leave Gameplay

Gameplay: Use arrow keys to hit the notes [you can change your keybind in settings]

=================== | Credits | ===================

V-pointDeveloper: Everything in this game

Mod from Friday Night Funkin

Beepbox.co: Website i use for my music

Made with Scratch

==================| Patch Notes |=================

v1.1 [Feb 14th, 2023]: Fixed exit system

v1.0 [Feb 12th, 2023]: Demo released

==================== | Extra | ====================
